details.name: Dry Time
details.info:
Touch:  10 minutes
Recoat: 1 hour
*Measured at 25°C and 50% relative humidity

details.name: Theoretical Coverage
details.info:
25-30 sq. m.
*Depending on surface texture and porosity
* per 4-Liters at 1.5-1.0 mils DFT

details.name: Tinting
details.info: Will accept BOYSEN®® Automotive Lacquer Tinting Colors at a maximum level of ¼ Liter per 4-Liter can. Darker shades should be factory-mixed.
